analyze_code.description: Analyzes Python code to provide a line-by-line explanation of what each line does.

find_bugs.description: Analyzes Python code to find logical errors or potential bugs.

generate_docstring.description: Generates a detailed docstring for a Python function.

parameters.code: The Python code to generate a docstring for

suggest_optimization.description: Suggest performance optimizations for Python code.

generate_test.description: Generate unit tests for a Python function.

parameters.code: The Python code to generate tests for

explain_code.description: Provide an explanation of the given Python code.
